meanings.definition: Not belonging to or associated with a cabinet.
meanings.sent1: The noncabinets chairs were placed around the table for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the noncabinets shelves for her books instead of the built-in ones.
meanings.sent3: The noncabinets lampshade looked like a colorful umbrella upside down.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a noncabinets room, filled with ideas scattered like loose papers.
meanings.sent5: The noncabinets flowers in the garden added a wild and free touch.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are not part of a cabinet.
meanings.sent1: The noncabinets gathered outside the government building to protest.
meanings.sent2: She was part of the noncabinets team that worked on the project independently.
meanings.sent3: The noncabinets joked about starting their own mini-cabinet in the break room.
meanings.sent4: In the office, the noncabinets were known for their innovative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The noncabinets brought fresh perspectives to the discussion.
